documentation.text:
@dev this is a try to abstract the PSS of airlines in real world
  all functions of this contract are only called if the payments, inside 
  FlightToken contract, are completed.
  
  in case of following refund to the customer, this contract reports to customer
  the client automatically reports this to the FlightToken contract. This contract then
  refunds if granted

  all functions of this contract are only called if the payments, inside 
  FlightToken contract, are completed.
  
  in case of following refund to the customer, this contract reports to customer
  the client automatically reports this to the FlightToken contract. This contract then
  refunds if granted

devdoc.details: this is a try to abstract the PSS of airlines in real world  all functions of this contract are only called if the payments, inside   FlightToken contract, are completed.    in case of following refund to the customer, this contract reports to customer  the client automatically reports this to the FlightToken contract.
